short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Every time your browser sends data to a Big Tech company, you will hear an audio cue.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to the ballet of Big Tech companies that you encounter online. Every time your browser sends data to a Big Tech company, you will hear an audio cue.
